name: Old, Old TV Shows Quiz | TV Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Before 'Mannix' and 'Barnaby Jones', there was a detective show called 'Peter Gunn'. Who played the title role?
questions.explanation:
Craig Stevens.

	With Lola Albright. Stevens was fine in the role. Horsley was 'Matt {Houston';} Ericson was with Anne Francis in 'Honey West'. Breck had a few shows, including 'Big Valley'.

questions.text: 'The Thin Man' was a pleasant, tongue-in-cheek detective show. Who was the star?
questions.explanation:
Peter Lawford.

	With Phyllis Kirk (and 'Asta', the dog). Cabot did 'Checkmate' and 'Family Affair'. Moore was 'The {Saint';} Long did 'Big Valley' and 'Nanny and the Professor'.

questions.text: 'That Was The Week That Was' was a political satire. Who was the 'star'?
questions.explanation:
David Frost.

	With Phyllis Newman and Nancy Ames. Keith was in a few {shows;} Little and Gorshin were in a show that utilized their impersonation skills.

questions.text: Robert Vaughn starred in 'The Man from UNCLE'. Who played his boss?
questions.explanation:
Leo G. Carroll

	Carrolll was also 'Topper'. Jaffe and Massey were in 'Ben Casey' and 'Dr Kildare', respectively. White was in 'Bewitched'.

questions.text: Who starred in the TV series 'Shane'?
questions.explanation:
David Carradine.

	With Jill Ireland. Talman was in 'Perry {Mason';} Ward was in a western called 'The Dakotas'. Drury was 'The Virginian'.

questions.text: Ann B. Davis is best known for 'The Brady Bunch', but she was also in a prior tv series
questions.explanation:
Love That Bob.

	The show starred Robert {Cummings;} Dwayne Hickman was also in it. 'Mothers' featured Eve Arden and Kaye {Ballard;} Novak was a vehicle for James Franciscus. 'Love,American Style' was a series of vignettes without a regular 'star'.

questions.text: Bea Benaderet is best known for 'Petticoat Junction, but she also played this other TV series.
questions.explanation:
Burns and Allen.

	With George and Gracie. 'Bean' was Edgar Buchanan. 'Buccaneers' and 'William Tell' were old shows from the fifties.

questions.text: Who starred in 'Run For Your Life'?
questions.explanation:
Ben Gazzara.

	Gazzara played the man who had only a short time to live. Fleming was in 'Rawhide'. Basehart was in 'Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea'. Erickson was in 'High Chapparal'.

Broderick Crawford.

	Brian was 'Mr. District Attorney'. Maharis was in 'Route 66' with Martin Milner. Webb, of course, was 'Dragnet'.

questions.text: Who was the star of 'The FBI'?
questions.explanation:
Efrem Zimbalist, Jr.

	Smith was with Zimbalist in '77 Sunset Strip'. Fuller starred with John Smith in 'Laramie'. McCord was in 'Adam 12'.
